name: /breɪk/
description:
/breɪk/

[CW] anxiety, loud uncomfortable sounds.

A short and glitchy experience about mental health.

This game is only played with mouse. Use headphones and fullscreen for a better experience♥

/breɪk/ was made for the Global Game Jam 2020  with theme "Repair"

Credits:

fenshan: Programming and design

Elmartipro: UI and design

Adonaí: Background art

Celes: Asset art

Miguel: Music and sound design

External assets used:

inconsolata font

staffantan's unityglitch shader
